basics.name: Shane Swayney
basics.label: Full Stack Software Engineer
basics.summary: Full Stack Developer at Conversant - Current Stack: Oracle SQL, Java, Spring Boot, JS, Typescript, Angular, NgRx, RxJs

work.summary: Responsible for full stack development: Oracle SQL, Java, Spring Boot, JS, Typescript, Angular, NgRx, RxJs
highlights: Developed external facing Publisher's Portal to manage sites and ad settings.
Advised management on how to best use new implantation standards and tools.
Designed, implemented and maintained REST services along side Web Sockets.
Built java services and angular front end client library for WebSocket messaging.
Utilized RabbitMQ and Docker to sync web socket queues between load balanced servers.
Utilized Elastic Search for change event logging and built admin dashboard to filter/search changes
Created materialized views for quick loading of daily/weekly calculated data
Conducted technical interviews
Utilized Tools such as BitBucket, Jira, Bamboo, GitKraken, Intellij, Atom

work.summary: Responsible for full stack development: C#, .Net Core, AngularJS, JS, JQuery
highlights: Responsible for full stack development using C#, .Net Core, Angular, JS, JQuery
Developed large RESTful services and APIs to meet internal and external business requirements
Developed customer facing Registration/User Management application back and front end
Created ASCII based anti-bot web service and frontend JavaScript library
Rewrote customer facing Knowledge Base backend and front end
Worked on small two-person team as well as larger teams on various projects
Redesigned soap/webform applications to use restful Web API and Angular
Managed multiple new projects while supporting legacy application code
Utilized Tools such as GitHub, TeamCity and Octopus Deploy

work.summary: Responsible for full stack development: C#, PL/SQL, .Net Core, AngularJS, JS, JQuery
highlights: Responsible for full stack development of web services and desktop/web front ends utilizing C#, PHP, Laravel, MVC4, JS, JQuery, IIS and Apache
Developed and Implemented a content management system/virtual table manager for external corporate website
Designed and Implemented a software IP tracking web application
Supported sales operations by managing and implementing new features in design win management software
Lead training sessions to expose application/IT departments to new software solutions
Attended change review board meetings as project lead to present new project ideas, requirements and priorities
Developed a highly-normalized object/attribute focused table structure in MySQL for corporate website to have the flexibility needed for current and future dynamic content management
Wrote Oracle/MySQL functions and stored procedures to support various applications and services
Created MVC4 front end for users to manage, run and debug PDI jobs
Updated bar code scanning software to use new bar code scanning API
Lead project to rewrite many desktop applications as C# MVC4 web applications
Received two companywide recognition awards for accountability and innovation

work.summary: Responsible for full stack development: Oracle SQL, PL/SQL, Java, C# .Net MVC, JSP, Struts, JS
highlights: Fixed and Implemented new features in large scale Java enterprise web applications
Created a dynamically resizable header/footer tile system for JSP pages exported to excel format
Restored functionality allowing users to copy shared profile items and added validation to prevent future errors
Fixed and optimized performance of large packaged procedures in Oracle Database 11g using PL/SQL and Toad
Modified Ant deployment scripts to correctly pre-compile JSP pages to comply with DOD security standards
Attended weekly C# .NET MVC 4 best practices meetings with fellow developers and leads
Chosen by lead developers to be part of a two-person project to migrate Java web apps to C# .NET MVC 4
Lead project to upgrade app container from Tomcat5 to Tomcat6 and apps from Java6 to Java7
